AddInstitute.title: Add an Institute | EduRankCR

Institute.title: Institution Details | EduRankCR

Paragraph.request_verification_email: If you haven't received a verification email, please enter your email address below to request a new one.
Paragraph.request_verification_email_sent: If you haven't received a verification email, please check your SPAM folder, or try again in 30 minutes.
Paragraph.wait_for_verification_email: Please don't close this page. We are verifying your email address, and it may take a few moments.
Paragraph.key_not_found: It's very strange, but we couldn't find your verification key. Please check given link or contact support.
Paragraph.key_invalid: It's very strange, and also a bit suspicious, but your verification key is invalid. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support.
Paragraph.key_expired: We know, it's annoying. For security reasons, codes are only valid for 30 minutes. Please request a new one to continue.
Paragraph.key_already_used: Oops! It seems that your verification key has already been used. Please request a new one to continue.
Paragraph.key_verified: You can now log in to your account.
Paragraph.change_verified: You can see your new email address in your profile settings.
Paragraph.request_password: If you forgot your password, please enter your email address below to request a password reset link.
Paragraph.request_password_sent: Please check your inbox for a password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
Paragraph.password_change_success: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with your new password.
Paragraph.success_logout: You have successfully logged out. See you soon!
Paragraph.form_legal_name: Please enter your legal name as it appears on your official documents.
